Class GameMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Menu
    public class GameMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements Menu
    An in game menu that pauses the game by taking control of the game loop

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameMenu​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow window)
      Creates a new in game menu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void displayMenu()
      Displays the menu on the screen
      Image getBackground()
      Returns the background image of the menu This menu has no background and so returns null

      Returns all the buttons present in the menu
      Button getChosenButton()
      Returns the selected button
